WorkItem.ClosedComment: Pet is receiving the Buff from the Hunter rather than having it applied itself
WorkItem.Description:
Trauma / Mangle increase bleed damage by 30%.
 
Cat family pets have an ability called Rake - Rake the target for 47 to 67 bleed damage and an additional 19 to 25 damage every 3 seconds.
 
So shouldn't Trauma/Mangle be options within the Pets Buffs section? I can't find anything saying that Trauma/Mangle increases pet damage, nor anything that says it doesn't, but it seems that it should...
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Trauma/Mangle Bonuses are missing from Pet Buffs
